>BTW, what kind of character suits a god of war?  [Mages/Archmages 
need not attempt this position.]  [Don't worry; he's going to show up 
in about the same manner as Sun Bai did, except having not so 
innocent backstory.]

I think a soldier or a barbarian would suit a god of war... I mean, 
they're the ones who are _really_ associated with fighting...
